contextId.information: "1/4 of a shekel." A shekel is a type of money used in the Old Testament. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bmoney]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])
The shekel is divided into 3 parts, 2 of 3 parts are given. "2/3 of a shekel" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bmoney]])
